title: This is how apps should be
comment: Small app that does what it says.. No ads, no other access permissions required... Perfect

title: Fantastic
comment: Fantastic app. Keeps track of all my fuel I use. Tells me avg mpg and cost.

title: OK but
comment: OK it's for UK market where we use Mpg as standard measure of efficiency. But buy fuel in litres. Wierd I know but that's the way it is. I wish the app could reflect that as I don't know how many gallons I put in with out using another calculator first. Great if it could. Please

title: Nice interface, weird tank size assumption
comment: The app is nice to look at. It has an easy to use interface with few buttons. User error - I now am aware of the full tank check box. Great app!

Hello...thanks for the review. Were you aware that there is also a "Tank Full" checkbox that you can select in the Add Fuel screen? You should select "Tank Full" when you add fuel and your tank is completely full, otherwise FillUp will just estimate your mileage. More information is provided on our web page: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#1

title: Great
comment: It's the best one I've used....

title: Good for keeping track of the money we're getting ripped off for gas...
I want more
comment: Love this app. I would pay for premium version that allows me to log oil changes and repairs/maintenance.

title: Great app
comment: I use it on my big rig to track fuel mileage, works great.

title: Varaman
comment: Up to now... OK
Plots inadequately displayed

title: Almost perfect
comment: The app itself works wonderfully and the statistics portion as well as plotting portion are very very useful. but the one major downside is that there is no way to save the data if you get a new phone you start from scratch , if there is a saving feature that could be added then this will get a solid 5 stars.

Hello...thanks for the review. You can use the Export/Import features to backup/restore data via CSV files and transfer data to a new device. Additional information is provided in the Help file and on our project web page here: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#5

Will calculate usage of petrol per miles, recomended to use in UK but for some ..ughm... reason you have to enter odometer value in KIILOMETERS! Why not Miles?????  thats why all calculations ARE WROOOOOOON!!!!!

title: Great App
comment: Been using it for a year now and works great. Only request is to have a user selectable time frame for reports. I would like to compare 2014 data to 2015 data.

title: Great
comment: I have no issues but i may manually check some entries just to be sure calculations didn't get skewed. But seems right on otherwise

title: Quick and slick
comment: Easy to use, works great. Seems to be a little fiddly about entering older receipts, you have to do it in chronological order, but that's a really minor issue.

title: Domingos
comment: The best

title: Easy to import
comment: Easy to import the. Csv file. Free.  Easy to use.

title: Simple and works
comment: I was looking for something that would help me easily keep a log off fill ups.  I also needed one that I could export that list.  This does both those things.  I use it regularly.
Best app do tracking fuel mileage. Very simple to use.

title: Needs improvement
comment: Love using the app. Pretty since. Any way to fix the x-axies of plots so the letters don't get cut off?

title: Incorrect calculations
comment: Filled up my tank 5-4-15 $32 @ 2.56 per gallon - only fillup for the month. Statistics  for the same month show I spent $83 and average fillup gas price $3.11 for the same month - WRONG. I suspect its including my fillup from 2014

title: Great little app!
comment: I've been using this for 6 months and it keeps accurate fuel economy. No, you don't have to fill it to the brim. Fill it until it stops should be good enough. You can do partial fills and it still remains accurate but make sure you don't select full tank when doing a partial.

title: Easy and convenient
comment: A simple and effective app. Would be nice to have a filter option to provide the statistics between user specified dates, not just by month.

title: Gas Grades Needed
comment: One thing this app needs is a selection for the gas grade that is used. I normally get Regular gas, but on occasion I get Plus. It would just be nice to log that historical info too.

title: Thanks alot
comment: Luv u guys

title: Grrreat app!
comment: Love it!!
Amazing  😃

title: Great app
comment: I don't understand when h christ means when he/she says you have to fill it to the brim for it to work. I find this app to be great. I use it all the time and it's easy to use. Love it! The only thing I have an issue with it keeps defaulting to a vehicle I only use in the summer

title: Not great
comment: Only works if you fill your tank to the brim. Ok for records but won't give accurate mpg.  Fuel log is much better

title: Odometer decimal point needed.
comment: It's a good fuel logging app but always gives incorrect results because it does not appear to allow a decimal point in the odometer field. I hope this simple oversight gets fixed soon because its great otherwise.

title: No decimal in odometer?
comment: Not sure why you would disallow decimal in the odometer entry?

title: Never gave mpg
comment: I have filled up four times and entered my information every time. The app has yet to give me my mpg.  Uninstalled.
Did you put a check mark in the "Tank Full" box each time you filled the tank? See the project web page for more info here: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#1
Great app keeps a log of the cost how much you use in the year

title: Perfect
comment: Evvvvvvvverything needed plus more

title: Excellent
comment: This does exactly what it says it does and isvery easy to use. Something that may be useful, but is certainly not a deal breaker, a service interval remindrer, even if this is manually entered by the user. ..Great App

title: At last a really nice fuel tracking app.
comment: I only have two suggestions, although I have no idea if either is possible. The ability to put a "start milage" into the vehicle definition, to account for the miles done before starting to track fuel use with this app. The ability to define if the odometer is in Miles or Kilometers. I ride bikes, some have imperial some have metric, the ability to set it on a per vehicle basis would make it easier to deal with that.

title: At least I know
comment: App helped me see where my money was going.....I need a new truck SOON!!!!

title: Best mileage software yet!
comment: Used quite a few different ones in the past only to resort to Google sheets when they inevitably asked for money or started ads. Unfortunately, none had export capability so I had to manually transfer the information. This one is open source ensuring it won't suddenly ask for payment and won't have potential privacy issues. Better yet, it allows for import and export is the universal CSV format so I was able to easily transfer from my spreadsheet.

title: Perfect
comment: Simple and effective. The notepad background on the log page makes me feel right at home, since I used to track this data in a notepad. It's apps like this that make smartphones so useful. Wish I could give it 6 stars; thanks William!

title: Great app
comment: I have tried them all. This works well and seems to be very accurate. No issues after a year of use.

title: Great app!
comment: Simple, easy to use app, yot very effective! Every fill comes with a pit stop at FillUp :)
Simple and very well laid out. Tried a few similar apps and this I'd say is probably the best. Use it all the time now.

title: Needs a small addition...
comment: This is a great app but has a flaw in that the first entry doesn't allow for mileage to be included - subsequent entries  calculate mileage from milometer readings.  Consequently overall mpg rating is diminished by the 0 mpg of the first entry.  That needs to be sorted.  Example - after a few months my overall calculations show  49mpg but this shows 33mpg. Otherwise month by month the app is spot on and easy and convenient.  One small change is needed - please!
If possible, please email exported CSV data and any captured screen images that illustrate the issue that you are seeing to wdkapps@gmail.com and we will investigate. Thanks.

title: Very good...
comment: Super app...

title: Great app!
comment: Does what it is supposed to do and is simple to use. It wound be nice if there was an option to automatically adjust the mileage for tire size changes.

title: Easy to use
comment: I've been using it for 2 months and have no complaints. Serves its purpose.

title: Great app!!
comment: Makes logging gas purchases simple

title: Love this
comment: Oddly enough, I look forward to filling up so I can use this app. It works great to track how much I spend on gas and my miles per gallon. I use the notes section to keep track of any car maintenance I do.

title: Yearly log
comment: Is there a way you can make a yearly log? Something where it tells you how much you used years past? Just a overall cost for the year.

title: Love it.
comment: One suggestion ..maybe have CSV file have the date added to file name instead of having to overwrite the same file when exporting.

title: Great App
comment: Easy to use, accurate and very helpful for fuel tracking.
Love it

title: Very Responsive Developer
comment: 2 weeks from favorite vehicle request to working update!  V2.1 works well.  Ability for user to specify fill-up log order (newest to oldest or oldest to newest) would be very nice.  Thank you William!!!

title: Perfect

title: Good app

title: Excellent
comment: For many years I have been using a spreadsheet to calculate my mileage. Last week before taking a trip I decided to see if there was an app that would do the same and found FillUp. Very pleased with it and looking forward to the addition of a default vehicle option.

title: Firefighters
comment: Excellent app.

title: Great app
comment: Took a little while to set up but is a great fuel log. Loved the fact that I could upload all the data from a CSV file. Only faults are that some of the stats are wrong and the plots don't fit on the screen.

title: Useful
comment: Good job.....

title: A fantastic app
comment: I use three apps like this one, but this is the best on the market and it's free. I hope it remains that way. I do have a couple of minor suggestions for improvement to make it even better that I hope that the developer will implement. Great app. I highly recommend it. Thank you

comment: Wish I had started with it when in first got my car. It is full of features, yet clean and simple! I love how you can track your average fuel usage and expenditures over time, in one, six, or 12-month intervals.

title: Very useful and nicely done.

title: Doesn't Compute MPG
comment: Keeps telling me "next fuel full it will begin computing mpg" ... uninstalling ..

In the Add Fuel screen, you need to put a check mark in the "Tank Full" box to indicate when the tank has been filled, otherwise FillUp will never calculate mileage.See our FAQ for more details: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#1

title: Simple
comment: Easy enough. Would like Fill tank to be default. Carry odometer into next fill. Change last two or three digits and go.

title: Suggestion
comment: Allow entry of historical data, date, odo, trip, gallons, etc

title: Fantastic app
comment: I agree that there should be an option to have full tank checked by default on new entries

title: Like this App
comment: I use it to track my motorcycle's gas milage. It's easy and quick to use at the pump. I used to write it down the input it later, now I  trust it and only enter it at the pump. I also use it to keep track of oils change's. And when I put new tires on the bike. I just make a fake gas entry and write what I need in the entry log notes. Would be nice if that was a feature.

title: Good App But.....
comment: This is an excellent app, however there is no way to backup your data for recovery in the event of a system crash or your have to change out your SD Card.  This makes it a one star.
You can backup/restore your Log data to csv file on Google drive or Drop Box. See the FAQ for more information here: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#5
Pretty decent app. Works for what I need.

title: Awesome app, but missing one thing.
comment: There needs to be a way to pick which vehicle you want to have as the default when opening the app instead of just having it be the vehicle on the top of the list. Or just add a way to drag and drop to rearrange the vehicle list.
Thanks. There have been many requests for a default/favorite vehicle feature. Working on this for a future update. Stay tuned...

title: Very useful
comment: Simple and easy to use.   Lots of useful information.  Very straightforward.

title: Awesome mileage/fuel tracker
comment: Started using this app after I bought my Toyota Prius and have loved using this app. Tracking my fuel economy and costs for gas is very simple. Thanks for creating this app!

title: Please make more apps!!!
comment: This app has everything I was hoping it had! Awesome job, simple and clean.
Bought a brand new Volkswagen Passat TDI and so far this app is very accurate..... Averaging 41.8 mpg. Great app.
It does what it says

title: Thanks for the info !
comment: Just started and seems simple and legit . But noticed when using year to date plot graph some of the numbers of the graph are cut off .  would also like to see G drive sync .

To transfer data to your new phone: Export Log data to Google drive on old phone, then create vehicle on new phone and Import data into empty Log from Google drive. See detailed steps here:
 http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#5  

Please email wdkapps@gmail.com if you need additional help.

title: Great App
comment: Had it a good few months now, didn't  realise how bad my mpg on my van was!!

title: Been a user for 2 years, still love this app.
comment: I use this app every time i fill up. So useful. Simple to use. Has never given me a single popup window nor any salesy messages. The trends and statistics charts are elegant and they reveal subtle changes in my driving patterns. Just awesome.
Great app. I just need to figure out the export part.

title: Currencies
comment: Why are there 20 different options for the same currency but no currency for Iceland or an option for pure numbers? I don't need a currency icon. I do however need a way to have the fuel cost at 11000 and not 11000,00 cuz that implies 100x the cost. I will just use Yen until then

The list of available currencies is obtained from your device. Does "ISK - Icelandic (Iceland)" show up as an available currency on your device? If so, does this currency not work properly for you? Please email us with additional details at wdkapps@gmail.com.

title: Love it!
comment: Awesome app! Works as advertised.

title: Great app!
comment: Does what it's supposed to, without asking for unneeded permissions, like other apps.

title: Really great
comment: app to keep track of my mileage and figure out which gas stations get the best fuel economy. It would be really nice if this included a tune up or oil change reminder too.

title: new update
comment: shouldn't disable the menu button, which has been working.
Does the job!

title: Great app.
comment: I love this app. An automatic Google Drive sync would be awesome, though. I lost all my mileage data when my phone crashed on me.

title: Export?
comment: I dont see an option to export my entries on my galaxy s5. Just had to get a replacement device and had to manually re enter my logs. Also no menu option to change currency or unit of measurement.            Edit: thanks to the developer for the reply. I didnt know that to bring up the menu I had to long hold my left soft key to bring up the app menu. This app is an easy to use and awesome fuel tracker!

Export, Import, and Settings are available through the Android Option Menu. Pressing and holding the bottom left soft key on an S5 will open the Option Menu. See this page for more details: http://www.androidcentral.com/samsung-galaxy-s5-menu-button-hidden

title: looks good
comment: been tracking my fuel usage since purchasing my car new - tracking in an Excel Spreadsheet. This, however, means I can enter _at_the_petrol_station_, and never have to hunt for the receipt :) One enhancement request - the ability to add "non-fuel" entries, eg service costs, tyres, etc. 4.5 stars :)

title: Awsome app
comment: Love this app only issue i found with this is after i put a small amount if fuel in my car the estamate always says 1/2 full for say $10 dollars or 2.060 gallons for a 20 gallon tank only issue i ha e found. Othrr than that i will still keep useing this app.

Thanks for the review. Regarding the estimate, it may not be very obvious, but you can move the gas gauge needle by touching it and sliding left or right to make the gauge match your actual fuel gauge. FillUp will then estimate your mileage based on how much fuel is left in the tank.

title: Good app in gas checking
comment: Simple is the best i like this app

If you enter mileage in km and gas in gal calculation is incorrect it does not convert km to miles before it calculates the mpg. This needs correction.  I have a Canadian vehicle KM odometer and buy gas in the US in gallons.

When MPG is selected in Settings-Units, FillUp prompts for miles and gallons when adding fuel. Have you tried selecting KPG in Settings-Units? In this mode, FillUp will accept kilometers and gallons when adding fuel, but will calculate Kilometers per Gallon (KPG) instead of Miles Per Gallon (MPG). Hope this helps.

title: Well done
comment: App is easy to use and maneuver. Changing units is simple and data is laid out in an easy to read fashion. Makes tracking your fuel economy an easy task over other similar apps.

title: Great app
comment: Just what i was looking for

title: I like it
comment: Simple app that does what it claims. Happy. A 'missed fill up' option would be nice - we're not all perfect at recording these things and it's frustrating having skewed stats. As someone else said below, default to Tank Full would suit me better.

Thanks for the review and suggestions. FillUp does currently provide some support for "missed fill up". You can select a "skewed calculation" in the Log and hide it. It will then be ignored in statistics and plots.  See the FAQ for more information here: http://wdkapps.github.io/help.html#4

title: Simple and to the point.
comment: The only change I would make is to add an option to check the "full tank" box by default.

When you Add Fuel you need to put a check mark in the "Tank Full" box so that the app knows when your tank is full. If you didn't do that, FillUp will not calculate mileage. Please check your Log to verify that the "Tank Full" box has been checked for the appropriate entries.

Great app, just cant access the general settings tab (Galaxy Note 2) as would like to set the currency to my countries.

FillUp uses the currency for the language/locale specified in your Android settings (Setting - Language and input). The next FillUp update (coming soon) will provide the capability to select a different currency.

FillUp should use the currency for the language/locale specified in your Android settings (Setting - Language and input). If this is not working for you, please email details for  your specific configuration so that we can recreate the problem.

title: Great simple App
comment: Does exactly what I want.

title: Backup to my Google Drive!
comment: I've been using FillUp for a couple months to track 3 vehicles. I can easily keep data backed up to my Google Drive account for safe keeping and importing from Drive is a breeze. If I lose my device, I'm covered. Read the "Help" section if needed.

title: Decent App Wished it doesn't require a full tank to work right
comment: It's a good app, about the same as others. It's annoying it requires you to put in a full tank to work right. I almost never fill my tank completely so it's a drag I can't use it to it's full potential.

title: Does not calculate at all
comment: Every time I fill, I get the message that it will not calculate until I fill more than one time. I have filled 4 times with one vehicle and 5 with the other, with no calculations at all. What a waste of time.  Update: Need to click tank full. Doh! Works fine now. 4 stars for not making that clear, but happy it works.

When you Add Fuel you need to put a check mark in the "Tank Full" box so that the app knows when your tank is full. If you didn't do that, FillUp will not calculate mileage. Please check your Log to verify that the "Tank Full" box has been checked for the appropriate entries.

title: Loved it until switched to Galaxy S5
comment: Loved this on my Droid Razr, but just upgraded to a Galaxy S5 and the settings and share function are no longer available.  I'm trying to import the CSV file I exported from my Droid but can't find the feature on the S5 either.

The commands you are looking for are in the options menu. Some newer android devices don't have a button to open the option menu. Not sure if that is the case with the S5. If so, you should see three vertical dots in the bottom right corner of the screen. Touch the dots to open the option menu. Hope this helps.

title: Perfect !

title: Great program!
comment: I've tried a few of these mileage apps and never found one that I really liked until now. Its very easy to use and doesn't mess up the works by trying to do to much like so many other's do. I'm using it on a Galaxy S2.

title: Clunky
comment: Full featured app but clunky way to handle partial fillups, no support for trip odometer and doesn't let you enter the per-gallon price, only your total bill. Who wants to subtract out your Doritos to get your fuel bill!?

title: Awesome Mileage Log
comment: Have been using for a month now. Sweet how the log and statistics work. Currently inpuuting complete gas usage of my 2003 Ford truck.

title: Easy to use

title: Very good tool.
comment: Hint: To enter a pure note, do not check filled tank, and enter 0.01 for the gallons and 0.00 for the cost. 《p》  I enter maintenence notes, ie oil changes, new tires, A/C recharges, brake jobs, etc. 《p》  Would like to be able to set my own date range for the graphs and reports.  This would help if a special trip was taken.

title: Does its job well.
comment: Overall, a good app, but would be better with the option to use trip miles instead of odometer.

title: Best of its type
comment: Does what I want simply looking forward to updates keep up the good work

title: Excellent UI. Simple and effective
comment: Really good for MPG. Would've given 5 stars if I could add maintenance log reminders. Does what it says and I do recommend.

title: Works great
comment: This app has been a smooth use since the day I got it.

title: Very good gas mileage tracker
comment: This app calculates your gas mileage without tracking your every move (which sucks the life out of your battery).  Very simple to use.  Easily uses American units unlike some others I've tried.

title: Great for keeping track of mpg, fuel cost, etc..
comment: Would like to see "cost per mile" for each fill up and overall average per month and total overall recorded. Other wise this is a great app. Easy to use.
Added cost per mile statistics in V1.6. Thank you for the suggestion!

title: Good but not right for me
comment: The gas gauge on my blazer doesnt work so I must track my mileage. This app only lets you enter total mileage. I only ever use my Trip Counter so I know how much I've driven since my last full up. If I could just enter the trip counter and have the app calc a running total it would get 5 stars. Being able to log oil changes would be Plus also.

title: The Best
comment: I've tried 10 different fuel calculation Apps and, without qualifications, this is the best. You can record multiple vehicles with straight forward data entries and get real cost statistics displayed in an easy to read format.

title: Poor averaging
comment: Does not allow for skipped mileage or for gas adjustments and will not average adjustment.

title: Brilliant
comment: I have just started using this app and already see you can import and export data. Fantastic. Was using fuel log app backed up all my data but was unable to import the data back in after rooting my phone. Data lost. So for 2014 I will be using this app and hopefully for ever more. Thank you   p.s. would be useful to have a calculator. To work out from previous fill ups how far you could get on £20 or how much it would cost to go say 100mls. Just saying.

title: Super app
comment: Superb quality

title: Excellent tool
comment: Simple and good way to monitor our mileage

title: Wouldn't run....
comment: On my Galaxy Note 1 - blank screen.

title: Does everything you want
comment: Install this now. It's free. It will do the math. It works. Just what I wanted. Thank you!
Great for interstate trips and working out how much fuel cost

title: Ok but needs More
comment: No dual cars graph display like MY CARS, or fuel type entry and graphing like FUEL BUDDY. Does not do trip but rather full odometer reading s.

title: Perfection
comment: This app is as close to perfect as possible. Simple to use.

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent gas mileage log just what I needed. Simple. Keep it this way!

title: Thank you!
comment: Very well designed; easy to use; HELPFUL app!

title: All in all good, but...
comment: There appears to be no option to change the currency to e.g Euros which I would require. Without that option the app loses loses its usefulness for me.

title: Nice
comment: Off lil on how mucg miles i drive by like 4 but i love it really starting to help me save money

title: Great little app
comment: Really simple to use and great  for keeping a record of fuel consumption.  Nice to be able to manage multiple cars

title: Just what I was looking for!
comment: I was using another app but really wanted an application to calculate my monthly gas costs. This one fits the bill.

title: Thumbs up!
comment: This app is truly a useful tool. Thank you!

title: Good
comment: Works great easy to use

title: Excellent!!
comment: This app saves me so much paper & calculating @ the pump. I always check my mileage. This is so easy.

title: very helpful
comment: use the app for budgeting, monitoring car performance and for peace of mind/entertainment. thanks to kraemer and github a lot and even more for not commercializing it
Great features, easy to use...Like the notes section.

title: Great little app
comment: Simple to use and works great so far. Thanks Will for taking some time to code this one!

title: Absolutely great!
comment: I never rate apps but this one is so good I had to! Nice and simple to use and doesnt charge you to import/export your data like all the rest! 5 stars for this one!

title: Brilliant app!!
comment: Does everything it says on the tin and more, plus its free with no adds. A well deserve 5 stars.

title: The best so far
comment: The best fuel consumption app I've found so far - will take litres input and still convert to mpg. More precise figures such as costings also available if required. Thanks for making this app for us

title: Fantastic!
comment: This app is free and works. It can track multiple vehicles, and can import / export logs.   Its awesome.

title: Simple and clean
comment: Upgraded to five stars after the most recent update! Is there a way to backup the data onto an SD card? So I can use it with different ROMs?
Thank you for your input. The latest update (v1.4) includes improvements to charts and statistics.

title: Not that good
comment: Does not allow you to enter fuel price.
Thank you for your input. The latest update (v1.4) addresses this issue. FillUp can now track fuel costs.

title: Great!
comment: Only  thing missing is a place  for " Price per Gallon."
